titles.title: United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2013
A bill to amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish a United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 2/11/2013--Introduced. United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2013 - Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.
